experience.title: Research Intern
experience.description: • Addressed the challenge of image reconstruction in multimode fibre imaging systems, where complex speckle patterns are generated• Curated a dataset of 5000 MNIST images to optimize model training and evaluation • Developed and implemented a high-accuracy autoencoder-based deep learning model achieving 92.7% precision in reconstructing images from complex speckle patterns in multimode fiber imaging systems.
experience.description_html: • Addressed the challenge of image reconstruction in multimode fibre imaging systems, where complex speckle patterns are generated• Curated a dataset of 5000 MNIST images to optimize model training and evaluation • Developed and implemented a high-accuracy autoencoder-based deep learning model achieving 92.7% precision in reconstructing images from complex speckle patterns in multimode fiber imaging systems. <!---->

experience.title: Research And Development Intern
experience.description: Co-author of a research paper titled " Cleaning Large and Medium Sized Space Debris with Robots using Swarm Intelligence" . Presented the poster at IAC Paris 2022 , France
experience.description_html: Co-author of a research paper titled " Cleaning Large and Medium Sized Space Debris with Robots using Swarm Intelligence" . Presented the poster at IAC Paris 2022 , France <!---->

experience.title: Data Analytics Intern
experience.description: Spaceonova, an EdTech Company, aimed to analyze customer attendance in their webinars and masterclasses across diverse topics. In my role as a data analyst, I conducted thorough Data Cleaning on Excel files containing registered participant data. I then designed and implemented a comprehensive Power BI dashboard. This dashboard included interactive visualizations showcasing attendee demographics, registration statuses, payment statuses, and other pertinent details, facilitating deeper insights and strategic decision-making for Spaceonova.
experience.description_html: Spaceonova, an EdTech Company, aimed to analyze customer attendance in their webinars and masterclasses across diverse topics. In my role as a data analyst, I conducted thorough Data Cleaning on Excel files containing registered participant data. I then designed and implemented a comprehensive Power BI dashboard. This dashboard included interactive visualizations showcasing attendee demographics, registration statuses, payment statuses, and other pertinent details, facilitating deeper insights and strategic decision-making for Spaceonova.
